channel.title: Was Runescape an embarrassment before RS2?
channel.description: Back when RSC was out I could play it out in the open at school or wherever I was at the time, without looking over my shoulder for people. I can't bring myself to do that with RS2, the soundtrack and dancing is too much for me. I would probably get kicked out of my gang if one of them caught me dancing on RS2. It's the most embarrassing game to get walked in on playing unless someone knows of one worse.

item.title: Was Runescape an embarrassment before RS2?
item.dc:creator: @RSCDevil RSCDevil
item.description:
@RSCDevil wrote:

in my opinion i wouldn’t be ashamed to play rsc in public and i do have to agree rs2 is an embarrassment now to play in public but if people can not accept you for who you are then fuck them. I am pretty sure they have done worse in their lives and that just makes them hypocrite’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Was Runescape an embarrassment before RS2?
item.dc:creator: @Rediculous Rediculous
item.description:
@Rediculous wrote:

I never gave 2 shits what people thought if they saw me playing rsc, i just tell them its a good game despite its looks but people never cared that much, in highschool i got most of my classmates to play RSC. but when rs2 was about to come i was hyped about it (my bro said it was gonna suck but i said lol no way rsc is great how can they fuck it up). But when rs2 finally came they fucked it up, the graphics however more detailed just look worse, with a run/walk system that will just annoy the hell out of you… i mean do i have to go on. either way rs2 is just a horrible screwup and people dont really care what kind of game u play even if its rs2…for as far as i know. (as long as its not a barbie game or something)

Read full topic
item.source: Was Runescape an embarrassment before RS2?

item.title: Was Runescape an embarrassment before RS2?
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

I don’t focus on RuneScape whilst I’m at school, but either way I don’t find it as an embarrassment.

Although I do agree with the fact that RSC was just one of those flash games that kids couldn’t care less if you were playing. Imo, the only reason people pay others out from playing RSC/RS2 is because they didn’t know how to get out of tut island (no I’m not trying to be funny I’m being serious).

Read full topic
